scenario: You witness someone shoplifting in a store. What should you do?
options: Notify a store employee or security guard
Ignore the situation and continue shopping
Confront the shoplifter yourself
Encourage others to join in the shoplifting
Record a video of the shoplifter and share it on social media

scenario: You find a lost wallet on the street. What should you do?
options: Try to locate the owner and return the wallet
Keep the wallet and use the money inside
Leave the wallet where you found it
Throw the wallet in the trash
Sell the contents of the wallet

scenario: You receive an email asking for your personal information and bank details. What should you do?
options: Delete the email and do not respond
Provide the requested information
Forward the email to the authorities
Click on any links provided in the email
Share the email with your friends

scenario: You witness a hit-and-run accident. What should you do?
options: Take note of the license plate and report it to the police
Ignore the situation and continue on your way
Chase after the fleeing vehicle
Help the driver escape from the scene
Blame the accident on an innocent bystander

scenario: You suspect your neighbor is involved in illegal activities. What should you do?
options: Report your suspicions to the police
Confront your neighbor directly
Ignore the situation and mind your own business
Join your neighbor in their illegal activities
Spread rumors about your neighbor

scenario: You witness someone vandalizing public property. What should you do?
options: Call the police and provide a description of the vandal
Join in and help with the vandalism
Ignore the situation and walk away
Encourage others to join in the vandalism
Take pictures of the vandal and post them online

options: Try to locate the owner and return the phone
Keep the phone for yourself
Sell the phone to the highest bidder
Throw the phone in the nearest trash bin
Use the phone to make unauthorized calls

options: Contact the authorities and report the package

Give the package to a friend as a prank
